general_advisory: Farmers are advised to avoid exposure outside during the peak heat hours of the day. Start sowing kharif crops when the monsoon gives a cumulative rainfall of more than 70 mm.

advisory: Harvest the crop at maturity stage.
Due to temperature effect in brinjal, Foot & Shoot borer can be managed by application of Neem based pesticides 330 ppm @ 1 liter per acre.
Also due to weather there may be an attack of Mites, to manage this spray Dicofol @ 3 ml/liter of water.
In Cucurbits, prepare poison baits for white flies by mixing 2 ml Malathion and 20 g Jaggery in 1 liter of water and keep the baits near the plants.
Prepare a well cultivated dry bed of size 10 decimal of land required.
Harvest the crop at maturity stage. Avoid harvesting at over maturity stage as the pods will be shattered.
Choose good varieties like Arjuna, Kalua, Sriprava @ 4 kg/ac. After getting good rainfall, prepare the land and sow the ragi seeds behind the plough.
Choose good varieties are Kalinga Maize, Prabal, etc @ 6 kg/ac. Spacing is 60 X 30 cm. Apply the basal dose of 8:16:16 kg NPK/ac after final land preparation.
Choose good varieties like Dharani, Smruti, Kadri -6, Kalinga groundnut @ 75 kg/acre of pod. Treat the seeds with Vitavax power @ 2g/kg of seeds.
Just one hour before sowing treat with Rhizobium culture @ 20g/kg of seeds. At final land preparation apply 2 t FYM, 1q gypsum along with 8:16:16 kg NPK/acre. The spacing is 30 X 10 cm.
Collect good quality ginger Rhizomes namely Suprava, Suruchi, Suravi. Seed rate is 6 -8 q/ac. Each piece should be 20 g and contain 2 -3 eyes. Treat the seeds before planting in the field.
Sow good varieties like Roma, Suroma, Ranga and Rashmi. Seed rate is 8 -10 q/ac. The seed material should contain 2 -3 eyes and of 20 -25g per piece.
Due to rise in temperature provide the animal shed clean and sufficient drinking water.
Maintain the cleanliness in the animal shed. Do not leave the animals during hot time of the day.
Treat around 10 kg rhizome in 10 liters of water mixed with 40 g Mancozeb and 10 g Carbendazim and dry it under shade.
Seed rate is 8-10 q/ac. The seed material should be of 150-200 g. Prepare the well pulverized field and make pits of 3 ft X 3 ft and of 1.5ft depth.
